mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tab_user ( username , password , name , birthday , sex , telephone , email , status , code ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{sex}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{status}, #{code} );
